item.title: Quiz: Which Hotel Credit Card Is Best for Dog Travelers?
item.description:
Not sure which hotel credit card is right for you and your pup? There are a lot of options ‚Äî Hilton, IHG, Marriott, Chase ‚Äî and the best one depends on your dog’s size, how often you travel, and what perks matter most.

Answer 7 quick questions and we’ll match you with the right card.

Why Your Dog’s Size Matters

Most hotel chains have weight limits (typically 50-75 lbs). If you have a larger dog, your card strategy should account for that:

  • Under 50 lbs: You’re welcome almost everywhere. Hilton and Marriott cards work great.
  • 50-75 lbs: Still good options, but check policies before booking.
  • 75+ lbs: Kimpton (IHG) is your best friend ‚Äî no weight limits, no breed restrictions, no pet fees.

If weight limits are a constant headache, IHG cards or Chase Sapphire (which transfers to IHG) should be on your radar.
